(Hey, welcome to Neo Beast Wars RPG, and yes, it is really cool.  There are
3 major factions that Ganthrax may join, the Maximals, the Predacons, and
the Alliance.  There are some smaller factions too.  Or, you can just be
neutral.  Ask the other members for help, get to know everybody, and have
fun!)

P.S. 'Coburn' is your last name??  I have the letters COBURN in my email
address name, DCOBURN.  DCOBURN stands for- Destructive Cohorts Oblivious
Bombs Unity of Raving Nuts.  Weird.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "MiChAeL CoBuRn" <impa_shadowsage@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2000 4:17 PM
Subject: The New Kid In Town


> Hey, I'm new to this RPG, I love Transformers stuff, I know my As and Ds,
Ms
> and Ps.  I read some previous posts, and, really, a Transformer's RPG is
> cool!!!  Tell me how this is for a first post and new character.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> [Ganthrax]
>
> Ganthrax was settling down by a lake, watching the night stars.  The water
> glimmered from the moonlight.  Ganthrax's dark body could only be seen by
> his glowing red optics.  He walked up to the edge of the lake, and looked
at
> his reflection.  He thought to himself, Earth was wonderful.  Marvelous.
> Ganthrax went over by some trees, and went to sleep, his red optics
getting
> dimmer and dimmer.  So much beauty, so many things to see, so many bots to
> kill.  Yes, Earth was wondeful.
>
> (Did I do okay?  Did I do anything wrong?)
> _________________________________________________________________________
